titleStmt.title: Seuen goulden candlestickes houlding the seauen greatest lights of Christian religion shewing vnto all men what they should beleeue, & how they ought to walke in this life, that they may attayne vnto eternall life. By Gr: Williams Doctor of Divinity
titleStmt.author: Williams, Gryffith, 1589?-1672.
Delaram, Francis, 1589 or 90-1627, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Snodham] for Nathaniell Butter,

notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved, and signed: Delaram scup: [sic].
The two pages after 617 are numbered 596 and 609.
Variant: title page has "houlding the seaueen greatest" ande 9 has "attayne vntu ..".
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Some print faded and show-through with some loss of print. Beginning-page 5, 358-367, 428-435, 540-555, 615-625, 636-6651, and 680-705 from Peterborough Cathedral Library spliced at end.
